shortdesc.ph: Sets the reverb effect for the local voice.
Sets the local voice reverb effect.

p.codeblock: Future<void> setLocalVoiceReverb( {required AudioReverbType reverbKey, required int value});
public abstract int SetLocalVoiceReverb(AUDIO_REVERB_TYPE reverbKey, int value);

section.p: The SDK provides a simpler method to directly apply preset reverb effects such as pop, R&B, and KTV.
The SDK provides a simpler method to directly achieve preset reverb effects such as Pop, R&B, and KTV.
The SDK provides an easier method to directly apply preset reverb effects such as pop, R&B, KTV, etc.
The SDK provides a simpler method to directly apply preset reverb effects such as Pop, R&B, and KTV.
section.note: This method can be called before or after joining a channel.
This method can be called before or after joining a channel.
This method can be called before and after joining a channel.
This method can be called before and after joining a channel.

plentry.pd: Reverb effect key. This method supports 5 reverb keys. See .
The value corresponding to each reverb effect key.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
